N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.4 - Medical treatment area

State Regulations
(a) A facility
shall provide a medical treatment area for diagnosis and treatment adequate to
meet the needs of the youth population. (b) Each facility shall develop, implement
and enforce a comprehensive medical housekeeping and infection control policy
and procedure specifically tailored to each medical treatment area. (c) All details, finishes and furnishings in
a medical treatment area shall be able to be easily cleaned and in a condition
which facilitates infection control. Notes
